title: Cecil Rhodes (rugby league)
text:
Cecil Arthur 'Johnno' Rhodes (1901-1966) was an Australian <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who played in the 1920s and 1930s.
Playing career.
'Johnno' Rhodes played for <a href="Western%20Suburbs%20Magpies">Western Suburbs</a> for six seasons between 1928 and 1933. He is remembered as a member of the winning premiership team of <a href="1930%20NSWRFL%20season">1930</a> which was the club's first premiership and playing in the team that were runners up in <a href="1932%20NSWRFL%20season">1932</a>. 
Death.
Rhodes died on 11 November 1966 at <a href="Petersham%2C%20New%20South%20Wales">Petersham, New South Wales</a>.
